title: Three innocent Kashmiris gunned down by Indian forces in IIOJK
content:
Three innocent Kashmiris were gunned down by Indian forces on Monday in Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu and Kashmir (IIOJK) and their bodies were abducted and buried at an unknown place without the permission of their families. Now their families are demanding justice.
